plot outline: In 2020, three young blokes, Jil, Jung & Juck with nothing in common between them, are assigned the task of transporting an Ambassador car coated with Cocaine-paint by the dreaded drug-lord, Dheivanayagam. Along the way they encounter Narasimhan with an almost identical car who makes small talk & tries to gel with the trio. After a night of drinking the trio escape the pub without his knowledge. But only later do they realize that in a drunken stupor they have taken Narasimhan's car & not their own.
title: Jil Jung Juk
plot: In 2020, three guys get into trouble, while smuggling cocaine.

In 2020, three young blokes, Jil, Jung & Juck with nothing in common between them, are assigned the task of transporting an Ambassador car coated with Cocaine-paint by the dreaded drug-lord, Dheivanayagam. Along the way they encounter Narasimhan with an almost identical car who makes small talk & tries to gel with the trio. After a night of drinking the trio escape the pub without his knowledge. But only later do they realize that in a drunken stupor they have taken Narasimhan's car & not their own.::PipingHotViews

The story takes place in 2020 and there is a huge demand for petrol and money. Deiva Nayagam (Amarendran) is an erstwhile powerful gangster and now, he has got one last chance to smuggle his cocaine. Deiva Nayagam hires three guys Nan'jil' Sivaji (Siddharth), 'Jung'ulingam (Avinash Ragudevan) and Jaguar Jagan (Sanath as Juk) to safely deliver the cocaine to a Chinese gang in Hyderabad. Meanwhile, Deiva Nayagam's sidekick Pai (Bipin) and Marunthu (Balaji Perumal) sketches a plan to steal the car from the trio through their guy Narasimhan (Naga) and sell the cocaine to another smuggler Attack Albert (Sai Dheena). What happens next ?::Surya Narayanan

A drug smuggling gangster wants to make a deal out of the last stock of cocaine with him. A scientist finds out a way to smuggle it without being detected by the police. The gangster appoints the trio, a driver, a time manager, a situation handler, to do the task. Their journey puts them in situations and they have to face three gangsters at the same time.
